reason: UNDEFINED ACTION ON SETS: The notation h_1({1,4}) is used to denote the image of a set under a permutation, but this action is never defined. The formal definition should state: For a permutation sigma and set S, sigma(S) = {sigma(x) : x in S}. This definition is NOT in scope. The transition from h_1(1) = 6 and h_1(4) = 3 to h_1({1,4}) = {6,3} assumes this definition without stating it.
